Danger!
Dense miasma ahead.
Entry is forbidden.

But you're standing on the wrong side!

But you're standing on the wrong side!

247177.<center>ー 優美なる夜明け ー\nヌッジォ・ラ・ヌァグータ 画\n<br:
"The Graceful Dawn" Painted by Nugio La Naguta
It depicts the dawn of the Demon World realistically with light colors and a delicate touch. It's a more subdued style compared to
his other paintings.

247178.<center>ー 朝食 その悲しみ ー\nマデサゴーラ 画\n<br>\nなん:
"Breakfast: The Sadness" Painted by Madesagora
A painting by Madesagora is on display... takes a long look at it.
It's a painting with a geometric pattern that fills the canvas with creative shapes. They can't quite figure out what's breakfast and
what's sad.

247179.<center>ー 森（愛にも似た景色） ー\nヒューデン 画\n<br>\n森:
"The Forest (A View Resembling Love)" Painted by Huden
A blood-like stain and a line resembling the shape of an eye are drawn over a forest landscape.
The painting gives a feeling of uneasiness.

247180.<center>ー 復讐の旅立ち ー\nサ・ラジョンナ 画\n<br>\nまばゆ:
"Departure of Revenge" Painted by Sa Lajonna
It depicts a demon leaving for somewhere in the midst of blinding light. Maybe the motif is the Demon Lord going off to Astoltia.

247181.<center>ー こごえるウドラー ー\nシジュラン・チー 画\n<br>\n:
"Freezing Treevil" Painted by Sijran Chi
It looks like a picture of a creature in the process of freezing that doesn't even look like a Treevil. Is it imaginary or is it real?

247182.<center>ー 大輪なる戦火 ー\nフェルバンドー 画\n<br>\n燃え盛:
"The Great Fires of War" Painted by Felbando
Amidst the blazing flames, the figures of monsters fiercely battling are depicted with bold and powerful strokes.

247419.テーブルの上に\n色あざやかな表紙の本が 置いてある。\nどうやら 誰かの日記帳:
There is a book on the table with a colorful cover. It looks like someone's diary.
It's been a long time since he left this country. By now, he must have traveled to Astoltia to see the beauty of the landscape.
Why did he leave me here without saying a word? I've been thinking about it for a long time, but I can't come up with an answer. I
had dreamed so much about the day we would leave together. I can't keep repeating the same question over and over again. Now all the
memories of our good times have faded, and all I can do is hope for the day when this pain will fade as well.

248336.<center>↑道なり 砂の都ファラザード\n<left>←ズムウル峠 危険！:
↑ Road to Farazard
← Zumul Pass, Danger!

249269.羽ペンが 描かれている。\n文字を書くための 道具だ。:
It has a depiction of a quill.
It's a tool for writing letters.

249270.木づちが 描かれている。\n彫刻の際に使われる 道具だ。:
It has a depiction of a wooden mallet.
It's a tool used when engraving.

249271.はさみが 描かれている。\n布を切るための 道具だ。:
It has a depiction of shears.
It's a tool for cutting cloth.

249272.パレットが 描かれている。\n顔料を載せるための 道具だ。:
It has a depiction of a palette.
It's a tool for placing paint.

249273.コテが 描かれている。\n塗装の際に使われる 道具だ。:
It has a depiction of a trowel.
It's a tool used when painting.

249274.絵筆が 描かれている。\n絵を描くための 道具だ。:
It has a depiction of a paintbrush.
It's a tool for painting pictures.

250330.バニトと書かれた\n古い石が 置かれている。:
There is an old stone with "Vanito" written on
it.

250331.ディセルと書かれた\n古い石が 置かれている。:
There is an old stone with "Dicel" written on
it.

250332.ルチオと書かれた\n古い石が 置かれている。:
There is an old stone with "Lucio" written on
it.

250333.タチアナと書かれた\n古い石が 置かれている。:
There is an old stone with "Tatiana" written
on it.

250334.スーゴと書かれた\n古い石が 置かれている。:
There is an old stone with "Suego" written on
it.

251042.子供たちの描いた 絵が飾られているようだ。:
It seems to be decorated with children's
drawings.

251043.上の棚には 子供向けの本が\n並んでいる。\n<br>\nオバケのピッピ 第１巻:
On the upper shelf, children's books are lined up.
Pippi the Ghost, Volume 1 "Kids who don't sleep get taken away, no ifs, ands, or buts!"
...or so it says.

251044.上の棚には 子供向けの本が\n並んでいる。\n<br>\nオバケのピッピ 第２巻:
On the upper shelf, children's books are lined up.
Pippi the Ghost, Volume 2 "Kids who cry get taken away, no ifs, ands, or buts!"
...or so it says.

251045.棚には 子供向けの本が\n並んでいる。\n<br>\nオバケのピッピ 第３巻\n:
On the upper shelf, children's books are lined up.
Pippi the Ghost, Volume 3 "Kids who say no get taken away, no ifs, ands, or buts!"
...or so it says.

251046.棚には 月明かりの家の\n日誌が 並んでいるようだ。:
The shelves are lined with journals from
the Moonlit House.

251048.子供たちが描いた 絵のようだ。\n<br>\nつきあかりのいえ まおうさま\nオ:
They appear to be children's drawings.
"Moonlet Hauwse" "Deemin King" "Gost Pipee"

251049.溶鉱炉からは 近づくだけで\n汗がふき出すほどの 熱気が放たれている……。:
The blast furnace is emitting heat so hot,
that just getting close to it makes you break
out into sweat...

252990.<center>ここはジャディンの園\n<center>弱き魔物たちの保護区なり:
Jadin's Garden
The sanctuary for weak monsters.

252991.<center>ここはジャディンの園\n<center>弱き魔物たちの保護区なり:
Jadin's Garden
The sanctuary for weak monsters.

253137.この先 大審門\n門をくぐる者は 一切の希望を捨てよ:
Demongate Ahead
Those who pass through these gates must
abandon all hope.

254087.深い色をした泉が 水をたたえている……。\n見ていると なんだか寒気がしてきた。:
The deep-colored spring is filled with water.
Just looking at it gives you chills...

254161.<center>ー 勝利の宝槍 ー\n<br>\n伝統の 馬上槍試合の優勝者だけ:
"The Javelin of Victory"
An honorable golden lance that only winners of traditional jousting tournaments are allowed to carry during celebration.

254162.<center>ー ゼクリアの大皿 ー\n<br>\n王の後継者が誕生せし時 こ:
"Platter of Zechrea"
When an heir to the throne is born, this platter is used to offer them a blessing, wishing for their success as a great ruler.
Upon their death, it is used to carry their head in mourning, as is tradition.

254163.<center>ー 四臣の宝剣 ー\n<br>\n建国王ワラキウスに従いし ４豪:
"The Sword of the Four Vassals"
The four noble families who served Warachius, the founding king, are represented as four different jewels.
The hilt of the sword is engraved with the words, "We pledge eternal loyalty."

254164.<center>ー ワラキウスの宝盾 ー\n<br>\nその比類なき魔力で ゼク:
"The Shield of Warachius"
A beautiful shield adorned with the crest of King Warachius, whose unparalleled magic abilities founded the nation of Zechres.
Inscribed on the shield's back are the words, "The greatest shield is that of wisdom."

254165.<center>ー ゼクリアの黄金杯 ー\n<br>\n建国王ワラキウスの妹 ゼ:
"The Golden Grail of Zechrea"
A golden chalice in which Zechrea, sister of the founding king Warachius, caught her brother's blood at the moment of his passing.

254166.<center>ー 王妃の礼杓 ー\n<br>\n代々のゼクレス王妃が 典礼の場:
"The Queen's Ladle"
A ceremonial ladle imbued with protective magic that has been passed down through many generations.
Queens of Zechres in the line of succession are required to carry it during ceremony.

254167.<center>ー とむらいの王冠 ー\n<br>\n王家に弔事ありしとき 喪が:
"The Crown of Mourning"
A simple crown that is to be worn whenever there is a funeral for the royal family. It must be worn until the mourning period ends.

254168.<center>ー 銀翼竜の角 ー\n<br>\n１０００年を経て 結晶化した:
"The Horn of the Silver Dragon"
This crystallized horn of a silver dragon formed over a period of 1000 years.
It was a gift from the Belastre family at the time, given to celebrate the establishment of Zechres Castle.

254169.<center>ー 魔瘴封じの護り ー\n<br>\n魔瘴石の結晶を かたどった:
"The Miasma's Protection"
A relief made from Miasmite crystal. When Zechres Castle was built, it was placed at its apex to protect the castle from miasma.

254170.<center>ー サバスの宝斧 ー\n<br>\nかつて ゲルヘナ幻野を支配し:
"The Axe of Sabas"
This battle axe has been passed down through the generations of the leaders of the Sabas tribe, who once ruled Gerhena Field.
It was presented as a gift to celebrate the nation's founding.

254171.<center>ー いつわりの占水晶 ー\n<br>\n大占術師アズウェンが用い:
"The False Crystal of Divination"
The crystal ball that the Great Seer Azwen once used.
After its master was sentenced to death, it then only provided false answers to any question asked of it.

254172.<center>ー 魔仙卿の錫杖 ー\n<br>\n大魔王選出の儀に向かう途中:
"Staff of the Oracle"
This staff was given to the then king of Zechres out of pity from the Oracle.
The king, on his way to observe the selection ceremony of the next Demon Lord, suddenly collapsed from illness.
He would later pass away within Goda Temple.

254173.<center>ー 勝利の宝槍 ー\n<br>\n伝統の 馬上槍試合の優勝者だけ:
"The Javelin of Victory"
An honorable golden lance that only winners of traditional jousting tournaments are allowed to carry during celebration.

254174.<center>ー ゼクリアの大皿 ー\n<br>\n王の後継者が誕生せし時 こ:
"Platter of Zechrea"
When an heir to the throne is born, this platter is used to offer them a blessing, wishing for their success as a great ruler.
Upon their death, it is used to carry their head in mourning, as is tradition.

254175.<center>ー 四臣の宝剣 ー\n<br>\n建国王ワラキウスに従いし ４豪:
"The Sword of the Four Vassals"
The four noble families who served Warachius, the founding king, are represented as four different jewels.
The hilt of the sword is engraved with the words, "We pledge eternal loyalty."

254176.<center>ー ワラキウスの宝盾 ー\n<br>\nその比類なき魔力で ゼク:
"The Shield of Warachius"
A beautiful shield adorned with the crest of King Warachius, whose unparalleled magic abilities founded the nation of Zechres.
Inscribed on the shield's back are the words, "The greatest shield is that of wisdom."

254177.<center>ー ゼクリアの黄金杯 ー\n<br>\n建国王ワラキウスの妹 ゼ:
"The Golden Grail of Zechrea"
A golden chalice in which Zechrea, sister of the founding king Warachius, caught her brother's blood at the moment of his passing.

254178.<center>ー 王妃の礼杓 ー\n<br>\n代々のゼクレス王妃が 典礼の場:
"The Queen's Ladle"
A ceremonial ladle imbued with protective magic that has been passed down through many generations.
Queens of Zechres in the line of succession are required to carry it during ceremony.

254179.<center>ー とむらいの王冠 ー\n<br>\n王家に弔事ありしとき 喪が:
"The Crown of Mourning"
A simple crown that is to be worn whenever there is a funeral for the royal family. It must be worn until the mourning period ends.

254180.<center>ー 銀翼竜の角 ー\n<br>\n１０００年を経て 結晶化した:
"The Horn of the Silver Dragon"
This crystallized horn of a silver dragon formed over a period of 1000 years.
It was a gift from the Belastre family at the time, given to celebrate the establishment of Zechres Castle.

254181.<center>ー 魔瘴封じの護り ー\n<br>\n魔瘴石の結晶を かたどった:
"The Miasma's Protection"
A relief made from Miasmite crystal. When Zechres Castle was built, it was placed at its apex to protect the castle from miasma.

254182.<center>ー サバスの宝斧 ー\n<br>\nかつて ゲルヘナ幻野を支配し:
"The Axe of Sabas"
This battle axe has been passed down through the generations of the leaders of the Sabas tribe, who once ruled Gerhena Field.
It was presented as a gift to celebrate the nation's founding.

254183.<center>ー いつわりの占水晶 ー\n<br>\n大占術師アズウェンが用い:
"The False Crystal of Divination"
The crystal ball that the Great Seer Azwen once used.
After its master was sentenced to death, it then only provided false answers to any question asked of it.

254184.<center>ー 魔仙卿の錫杖 ー\n<br>\n大魔王選出の儀に向かう途中:
"Staff of the Oracle"
This staff was given to the then king of Zechres out of pity from the Oracle.
The king, on his way to observe the selection ceremony of the next Demon Lord, suddenly collapsed from illness.
He would later pass away within Goda Temple.

254732.門は かたく 閉ざされている。\n魔幻園の 別の入り口に通じていたようだが\n地:
The gate is stubbornly closed. It appears to have once connected to another entrance of the Demon Park, but the terrain has
since changed, making it impassable.

254733.<left>ひっくり返った 奇妙なオブジェに\n<left>文字が 刻まれている:
On the peculiar, overturned object, some characters are engraved...
Fortune: "Great Luck" The world shall revolve around you. Everything will be as you wish!
...It seems to be one of Madesagora's creations. Apparently, it has no real meaning to anything.

254734.<left>ひっくり返った 奇妙なオブジェに\n<left>文字が 刻まれている:
On the peculiar, overturned object, some characters are engraved...
Fortune: "Luck" A mystical power will fill your body. Everything will be just fine.
...It seems to be one of Madesagora's creations. Apparently, it has no real meaning to anything.

254735.<left>ひっくり返った 奇妙なオブジェに\n<left>文字が 刻まれている:
On the peculiar, overturned object, some characters are engraved...
Fortune: "Middling Luck" You will know a certain amount of luck. You will spend your time in good spirits.
...It seems to be one of Madesagora's creations. Apparently, it has no real meaning to anything.

254736.<left>ひっくり返った 奇妙なオブジェに\n<left>文字が 刻まれている:
On the peculiar, overturned object, some characters are engraved...
Fortune: "Tiny Luck" Time will pass as normal. Nothing happening is still happiness.
...It seems to be one of Madesagora's creations. Apparently, it has no real meaning to anything.

254737.<left>ひっくり返った 奇妙なオブジェに\n<left>文字が 刻まれている:
On the peculiar, overturned object, some characters are engraved...
Fortune: "Bad Luck" An innocent demon will love you. Nothing will go well, it seems.
...It seems to be one of Madesagora's creations. Apparently, it has no real meaning to anything.

254738.<left>ひっくり返った 奇妙なオブジェに\n<left>文字が 刻まれている:
On the peculiar, overturned object, some characters are engraved...
Fortune: "Very Bad Luck" Wandering through an abhorrent nightmare, each moment burning in a hellish fire.
...It seems to be one of Madesagora's creations. Apparently, it has no real meaning to anything.

254739.<center>ー 影と光の抱擁 ー\n<center>マデサゴーラ 作<br>:
"Embrace of Shadow and Light" by Madesagora
From the picture that is divided into shadow and light, two hands emerge as if reaching out to embrace nothingness.
The texture of the hands is unnervingly lifelike... Staring intently, it feels as if they'll drag you straight into the painting.

254740.<center>ー したたる欲望 ー\n<center>マデサゴーラ 作<br>:
"Dripping Desires" by Madesagora
A twisted object with wings of various shapes. The hands that extend out like splashes seem to express desire.

254741.<center>ー 自由なるラ・テート ー\n<center>マデサゴーラ 作<:
"La Tete, the Free" by Madesagora
A winged head is adorned with insect-like legs. The earrings look familiar... Perhaps the artist used himself as a model.

254742.<center>ー 目覚め あるいは 祈り ー\n<center>マデサゴーラ:
"Awakening, or Perhaps a Prayer" by Madesagora
Two thorny vines are entwined around a large eyeball. It feels as if it is watching you, filling your heart with unease.

254743.<pc>は 目の前の絵をながめた。<br>\n……作成途中とおぼしき 巨大な絵だ:
looks at the painting in front of them.
It's a gigantic painting that hasn't been finished yet. It looks to be a self-portrait of Madesagora.

254744.大きな絵筆が 無造作に置かれている。\nマデサゴーラは これで 絵を描いていたよ:
A large paintbrush is haphazardly placed.
Madesagora used to paint with this, it seems.

254745.<pc>は ハンドルを調べてみた。<br>\n……どうやら 絵を吊るす装置のよう:
examines the handle.
It's a device for hanging paintings. However, it appears to be broken and is unlikely to function.

254746.シャンデリアが 床に転がっている。\n……天井が壊れた時に 落ちてしまったようだ:
A chandelier lies sprawled on the floor.
It seems to have fallen when the ceiling
collapsed.

254747.ツボの中は 顔料で 満たされている……。\n中身は まだ 乾いていないようだ。\:
The pot is filled with pigment. Its contents
have yet to dry out.
Perhaps it's a special kind.

254748.<pc>は 目の前の絵をながめた。<br>\n……マデサゴーラが描いた 未完成の:
looks at the painting in front of them.
It's a painting by Madesagora that's yet to be finished. Who knows what it will look like when it's finished?

254749.<pc>は イーゼルの絵をながめた。<br>\n……マデサゴーラが描いた 未完成:
looks at the painting on the easel.
It's a painting by Madesagora that's yet to be finished. Perhaps he lost interest in the middle of painting it?

254750.カンバスが 散乱している。\n天井が壊れた衝撃で 散らかったのだろうか。:
Canvases are scattered everywhere.
Perhaps they were strewn about when
the ceiling collapsed.

254751.とても 大きなベッドだ。\n……どうやら アトリエに こもっている時\nマデサゴ:
It's quite a large bed. This must have been
where Madesagora slept while he was holed
up in his studio.

257547.<center>大魔道士リドの遺産は ここにあり。\n汝 我が遺産を 求めるなら:
The legacy of the Archmage Lido lies here.
If thou seek my legacy, come to me, who
slumbers in the depths of the mausoleum.

257548.<center>大魔道士リドの遺産は\n知恵と 意志ある者にのみ 授けられる。\:
The legacy of Archmage Lido shall be granted
only to those with wisdom and resolve.
You must gather the three words.

257549.古びた石碑の 中央には\nこう 刻まれている……。\n<br>\n<center:
In the center of the ancient stone monument, the following is inscribed...
"われじ"

257550.古びた石碑の 中央には\nこう 刻まれている……。\n<br>\n<center:
In the center of the ancient stone monument, the following is inscribed...
"ゆうをも"

257551.古びた石碑の 中央には\nこう 刻まれている……。\n<br>\n<center:
In the center of the ancient stone monument, the following is inscribed...
"とむ"

257552.<center>大魔道士リドの遺産は\n知恵と 意志ある者にのみ 授けられる。\:
The legacy of Archmage Lido shall be granted only to those with wisdom and resolve.
Combine the three words correctly and speak them aloud before this monument, in a voice that can be heard by those around you.

257620.<left><pc>は\n石碑に刻まれた文字を 読んだ。\n<br>\n<cen:
reads the words engraved on the stone monument.
Trust only in your own strength and wisdom, live as your own god, free from the control of othersーthat is the essence of what it means
to be a demon.
Those with overwhelming power, who seek to enslave others, are endless. However, all one needs to control is their own heart.
To those who suffer under a curse of binding, I leave behind some strength of mine as a token of aid.
However, take heed. Only those who can stand on their own feet are worthy of salvation. To those who cannot defeat my reflection,
you may not have it.

257654.<center>ー 美しき 我が宮殿 ー\n<center>マデサゴーラ 画\n:
"My Beautiful Palace" Painted by Madesagora
It depicts a sinister looking palace with many vibrant colors.

257655.<center>ー パートス ー\n<center>マデサゴーラ 画\n<br>:
"Partos" Painted by Madesagora
Something resembling wings is brilliantly depicted, radiating much light.
At first glance, the piece appears fantastical and uses many bright colors. Upon closer inspection, it's actually quite unsettling.

257656.<pc>は 絵画を ながめた。\n<br>\n……タイトルや 作者名が 見当たら:
looks at the painting.
They couldn't find a title or the artist's name. It appears to be a piece in which Peperogora imitated one of Madesagora's works.

257657.<center>ー 愚かなる悪霊の吐息 ー\n<center>マデサゴーラ 画\:
"The Breath of a Certain Evil" Painted by Madesagora
A creepy looking mouth sprouts from the ground and is breathing out something resembling smoke.
Just what could it possibly mean?

257658.<center>ー 雷葬 ー\n<center>マデサゴーラ 画\n<br>\n:
"Burial by Thunder" Painted by Madesagora
is not sure what's being depicted, but it's strangely overwhelming to look at.
.......
Before they know it, goosebumps cover their body. They'd been gazing at it for longer than they thought.

259373.返事がない。\nただの しかばねのようだ……。:
There's no response.
It's just a corpse.
